summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Про.Маркируй web application. Backend APIs are 100% functional. Frontend has critical issues with Contact page (react-input-mask error) and Check Product result display. Import and Equipment flows work perfectly.

critical_bugs.issue: Page crashes due to react-input-mask error: 'reactDom.findDOMNode is not a function'
critical_bugs.impact: Contact form is completely non-functional - users cannot submit requests
critical_bugs.suggested_fix: Update react-input-mask to latest version or replace with alternative phone input library compatible with React 18

critical_bugs.issue: Result page renders blank after successful API call (API returns 200 OK but result is not displayed)
critical_bugs.impact: Users cannot see if their product requires marking after completing the check flow
critical_bugs.suggested_fix: Debug result state management and rendering logic in CheckProductPage.js around line 88-96

ui_bugs.issue: Step 3 result display not rendering (blank page)

passed_tests: Frontend: Home page loads with hero section
Frontend: Logo with dot displayed in header
Frontend: Check Product - Step 2 (source and volume selection)
Frontend: Import - Step 3 (3 import schemes displayed)
Frontend: Equipment - Step 4 (recommendations with 4 items and budget)

success_percentage.frontend: 70% (23/33 tests passed - 2 critical bugs blocking Contact page and Check Product result)

critical_fixes_required.action: Replace react-input-mask with a React 18 compatible alternative (e.g., react-imask or custom implementation) OR update to latest version that supports React 18

critical_fixes_required.issue: Check Product Step 3 result not displaying
critical_fixes_required.action: Debug result state and rendering logic. API call succeeds (200 OK) but result is not rendered. Check lines 74-96 and result rendering logic at lines 231-317

minor_fixes.issue: Fixed import.meta.env usage (was causing 'Cannot use import.meta outside a module' error)
minor_fixes.action: Already fixed by testing agent - changed to process.env.REACT_APP_BACKEND_URL
